alert.note: Alert for Barry; Christian; Lawrence; Stone; Taney (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 6:13PM CDT until August 08 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Taney County in southwestern Missouri... Central Christian County in southwestern Missouri... Stone County in southwestern Missouri... Northern Barry County in southwestern Missouri... Southern Lawrence County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 613 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Nixa to near Marionville to near Sarcoxie, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Nixa... Ozark... Table Rock Lake... Monett... Aurora... Mount Vernon... Marionville... Clever... Crane... Pierce City... Purdy... Billings... Reeds Spring... Highlandville... Fremont Hills... Verona... Branson West... Butterfield... Galena... Mccord Bend... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
